description:
This travel kit contains an assortment of small bottle and jars with handy, colour-coded caps. Perfect for toting shampoo, sunscreen, and many other lotions and potions.

  • Made of HDPE plastic
  • Kits are packaged in reusable, heavy-duty "zipper" bags
  • Guaranteed leakproof
  • Dishwasher safe (top rack only)
  • Withstands temperatures from -100ºC to 120ºC
  • Jars are not recommended for liquid storage
name: Nalgene Small Travel Kit
